sec.p: M. peltata distribution is restricted to warm tropical regions (Paynter et al. 2006). Using the Wet Tropical species template as a starting point, the minimum (DV0) and maximum (DV3) threshold temperatures were set at 15 and 33°C, respectively. The lower (DV1) and upper (DV2) optimal temperatures were set at 18 and 30°C, respectively, based on the response of similar tropical vines. These provided a good fit to the observed global distribution (Taylor et al. 2012b).
